column4: Anyone able to tell me how to install hoarty (or whatever its name is?)... total linux newb :)
there are problems with Hoary sometimes
best to wait a few weeks till it is released as stable
ok, I will tell you if you really want
it's case sensitive, do sudo /etc/apt/sour(tab)  {the tab will fill in the blanks}
you have to save the file first
ok let's do it this way
that will open a new window
ok go down to the entries that has a checkbox marked.
look for the entry that looks like >> deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ warty main restricted universe
change the part that says warty with hoary and click ok
sorry I havn't had any beer yet  :P >> http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/HoaryUpgradeNotes
